faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions

accuracy.question: How accurate is the AI background removal?
accuracy.answer: Our AI achieves 95%+ accuracy with advanced edge detection algorithms. It works best with clear subject-background contrast and handles complex elements like hair, fur, and transparent objects.

formats.question: What image formats are supported?
formats.answer: We support JPG, JPEG, PNG, WebP, BMP, and GIF formats. The output is always in PNG format with transparent background for maximum compatibility.

fileSize.question: Is there a file size limit?
fileSize.answer: Yes, the maximum file size is 10MB per image. For best results, we recommend images with at least 500x500 pixels resolution.

processingTime.question: How long does processing take?
processingTime.answer: Most images are processed within 3-10 seconds, depending on image complexity and server load. Complex images with intricate details may take slightly longer.

privacy.question: Are my images stored on your servers?
privacy.answer: No, we prioritize your privacy. Images are processed in real-time and automatically deleted from our servers immediately after processing. We never store or access your images.

commercial.question: Can I use this for commercial purposes?
commercial.answer: Yes, absolutely! Our service is free for both personal and commercial use. Perfect for e-commerce, marketing materials, and professional photography.

imperfectResults.question: What if the result isn't perfect?
imperfectResults.answer: While our AI is highly accurate, results may vary based on image quality and complexity. For best results, use high-contrast images with clear subject separation from the background.

reallyFree.question: Is this service really free?
reallyFree.answer: Yes, completely free with no hidden costs, watermarks, or subscription fees. We believe in providing accessible AI tools for everyone.

faq.contactUs: Feel free to reach out to us for any additional support or inquiries.
